publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4850 Ms Maureen Watt: Further Congratulations to Aberdeenâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the City of Aberdeen and Aberdonians for their success in winning the city category in the Britain in Bloom awards, which follows on from their recent victory in the Scotland in Bloom awards.
S2M-4850 Further Congratulations to Aberdeen (lodged on 22 September 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Alex Johnstone*, Stewart Stevenson*

S2M-4850 Further Congratulations to Aberdeen (lodged on 22 September 2006) Mr David Davidson*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Brian Adam*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Michael Matheson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4850 Further Congratulations to Aberdeen (lodged on 22 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4850 Further Congratulations to Aberdeen (lodged on 22 September 2006) Ms Sandra White*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Eleanor Scott*
